Installation¶

To install the stable build:

# Linux/macOS
python3 -m pip install -U psup

# Windows
py -3 -m pip install -U psup

Hoever pip install sup generally works.

For the less stable development function:

# Directly from git
git clone https://github.com/EnokiUN/sup

# Using pip (make sure you have git installed)
pip install -U git+https://github.com/EnokiUN/sup
